title: Event trigger
description: An event trigger which runs actions when a matching event is received from a component

target.title: Target component
target.description: Type of component which sent event

event.title: Event name
event.description: Event name. Multiple event names may be given by joining them with '|'

items.title: Parameter match setup
items.description: Parameter value. Multiple accepted values may be given by joining them with '|'

expression.title: Parameter match expression
expression.description: Expression to match parameter value. Multiple accepted values may be given by joining them with '|' or all can be allowed by using 'any'

inverted.title: Invert match expression
inverted.description: Inverts the match expression if set to true

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: The actions which should run when the event is triggered
